about_the_game:
Game Description

Once a peaceful and tranquil town... now lost in the shadows of silence and abandonment. The story of a man trapped between the secrets whispered by the rain and the fears hidden in the mist... Alex.

Story

Alex's ordinary journey took an unexpected turn when his car broke down. Exploring the mysterious tunnels of an ancient temple complex he discovered in the depths of the forest, he found himself in this abandoned town. Now, not only his curiosity but also his fight for survival brings him here.

While wandering through the streets, Alex found an old book in an abandoned bookstore. The book revealed the secrets of ancient civilizations and cults. Following the traces of the mysterious Nox Aeterna cult, every page drew him deeper. Every corner of this town is a puzzle, every shadow a trap.

Gameplay

Exploration and Puzzle Solving

Explore the abandoned streets, apartment rooms, and underground tunnels of the town. Solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the Nox Aeterna cult.

Atmospheric Tension

A world filled with dense fog, endless rain, and a nightmarish atmosphere where reality and nightmares blur together.

Story-Driven Experience

Dive into a rich narrative that reveals the town's dark past and the mysteries of the cult. Each clue takes you deeper into the story.

Features

  • Deep Story: Discover the secrets of ancient civilizations and the dark past of the Nox Aeterna cult.

  • Atmospheric Graphics: Experience the haunting atmosphere of the town dominated by fog and rain.

  • Thrilling Gameplay: Struggle to survive in a world filled with dangers and secrets.

Do You Dare?

Do you have the courage to accompany Alex on his journey filled with darkness and danger? Are you ready to uncover the truths hidden behind the mist and rain?

The secrets of the town await you...

name: Tales of Ancients

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 21H2 or above
  • Processor: Intel i3/i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 21H2 or above
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Tales of Ancients is an atmospheric exploration game that tells the story of a man struggling to survive in a deserted town while tracing an ancient cult. In this world filled with heavy rain and mysterious rituals, you will uncover dark secrets.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, French, German, Polish
*languages with full audio support
